experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis mutant for or overexpressing spl13

description.text: The expression profiles were determined using Affymetrix ATH1 arrays. Comparisons among the Col-0, SPL13 and mSPL13 sample groups allow the identification of genes regulated by SPL13. Keywords: Potential upregulated and downregulated genes Arabidopsis 3 days seedling from three independent biological replicates of Col-0, SPL13 and mSPL13 samples, which contain three independent seed lots each, were analyzed.

bibliography.authors: Martin RC, Asahina M, Liu P-P, Kristof JR, Coppersmith JL, Pluskota WE, Bassel GW, Goloviznina NA, Nguyen TT, Martinez-Andujar C, Kumar MBA, Pupel P, Nonogaki H
bibliography.title: The microRNA156 and microRNA172 gene regulation cascades at post-germinative stages in Arabidopsis

bibliography.authors: Martin RC, Asahina M, Liu P-P, Kristof JR, Coppersmith JL, Pluskota WE, Bassel GW, Goloviznina NA, Nguyen TT, Martinez-Andujar C, Kumar MBA, Pupel P, Nonogaki H
bibliography.title: The regulation of post-germinative transition from the cotyledon- to vegetative-leaf stages by microRNA-targeted SQUAMOSA PROMOTER-BINDING PROTEIN LIKE13 in Arabidopsis
